TopicTitle: Alpha mensies modular launch pads elevator problems

Articles.Content:
Hi, I've just installed  Alpha mensies modular launch pads mod but I'm having problems with the elevators on the Saturn launch parts (so far its the only one I've tried).

If I set a deploy limit for the main elevator so it only goes to the floor I want it to and then press elevator up it will continue up past it and straight to the top.

And also, the smaller elevator and the bottom of the launch pad is somehow not controllable while in a mission which is strange because it works just fine in the V.A.B.

 

If anyone else is having this problem or knows how to fix it then I would like some advice.
